advancements.adventure.summon_amethyst_g: Summon an Amethyst Golem and listen to its song
nacsworkshop.page.typeequals: Returns True if both argumens have the same type. Otherwise, returns false.
nacsworkshop.page.calculate_media: Returns the amount of media user has in inventory. I should remember that hexes can waste media!
nacsworkshop.page.slot_write: Remove an iota and number from the stack, and save the iota into the item in quick-slot with the number.
nacsworkshop.page.slot_read: Remove the top number, copy the iota from item in quick-slot with the number, and add it to the stack.
hexcasting.mishap.no_slot: %s needs a valid slot number to operate on but got %s
